thread.title: UK PM May says indications are Syrian authorities were behind chemical attack

title: UK PM May says indications are Syrian authorities were behind chemical attack
text:
UK PM May says indications are Syrian authorities were behind chemical attack 5:47pm BST - 00:58 
British Prime Minister Theresa May speaks to reporters in Birmingham about the information she has received following a suspected poison gas attack in Syria. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
British Prime Minister Theresa May speaks to reporters in Birmingham about the information she has received following a suspected poison gas attack in Syria. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
